name: Black Diamond Radha Shorts - Women's
description:
Keep on sending when the weather warms up. The stretch-cotton twill in the Radha Shorts is light enough to breathe but burly enough to stand up to sharp granite.Made from lightweight organically grown cotton with a hint of elastane for extra stretch.Gusseted crotch gives you room for wide stems or hand-foot matching.2 pockets in the front, 2 more in the back.
